content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other mining drills found) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5 y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5 y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belts at positions (x=63.5 y=-53.5) and (x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them, as seen in burner mining drills and inserter at positions (x=41.0 y=-82.0) and (x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power network, as seen in steam engine at position (x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Errors when using offshore pump and boiler
- Ensure that the offshore pump and boiler have fuel and are connected to a power network, as seen in offshore pump at position (x=106.5 y=-32.5) and boiler at position (x=111.5 y=-32.0)

### Errors when using stone furnace
- Ensure that the stone furnace has ingredients before attempting to use it, as seen in stone furnace at position (x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions defined by the agent.
No important variables assigned by the agent.
